channel.title: Rune crafting code?

item.title: Rune crafting code?
item.dc:creator: @kexion kexion
item.description:
@kexion wrote:

ok i want to make rune crafting skill.here is what i want to do.

When player has rune essense (rune essense id =1436)
they click craft on alter (alter id =2478)
it then gives them one air rune ( air rune code = 556)
and it gives them 500xp in runecrafting skill
and it deletes 1 rune essence.

so if anyone would know how to do this i would greatly appreciate it, I tried this code, but it doesnt seem to be working.

case 2478: if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { if ((playerHasItemAmount(1436, 1) == true)) { sendMessage("You Make air Runes"); stillgfx(247, absY, absX); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " Has crafted some air runes"); addItem(556, 1); deleteItem(1436, GetItemSlot(1436), 1); startAnimation(422); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { sendMessage("You need rune essense to make air runes"); } } break;

but when i click craft nothing happensâ€¦ so please help me, thanks

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 23, 2008, 07:51:52 PM[/size][hr]ok, actually it did work, but its weird because you have to click on a certain part of the alter to make it work, but ill fix that, also how do i make it give 500 agility xp?

Read full topic
